name: AWIL Mobile
description:
AWIL Mobile version!

Can you build a kingdom strong enough to survive another cycle? Another World Is Lost (AWIL) puts you on the edge of city-building game with a unique arcade style gameplay. Start with just the Tower and build routes, villages, monasteries, mines and wonders; as the cycles pass, hunters from the outside will kidnap your workers, plague will rise from the underground, bravos will steal your energy and terrible automata will try to shut you down prematurely. In the end, the Flaw, the mysterious world killer, will drag your empire to an end, but you'll have your top score and another possibility to rise again!

AWIL will not be updated. But keep an eye open, we'll return with some news :)
